segment.source: Windows updates (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Windows updates (Surface Hub)

segment.source: You can manage Windows updates on your Microsoft Surface Hub by setting the maintenance window, deferring updates, or using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS).
segment.target: You can manage Windows updates on your Microsoft Surface Hub by setting the maintenance window, deferring updates, or using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS).

segment.source: Windows updates (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Windows updates (Surface Hub)

segment.source: You can manage Windows updates on your Microsoft Surface Hub by setting the maintenance window, deferring updates, or using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS).
segment.target: You can manage Windows updates on your Microsoft Surface Hub by setting the maintenance window, deferring updates, or using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS).

segment.source: Maintenance window
segment.target: Maintenance window

segment.source: A default maintenance window is set for all new Surface Hubs:
segment.target: A default maintenance window is set for all new Surface Hubs:

segment.source: Start time: 3:00 AM
segment.target: Start time: 3:00 AM

segment.source: Duration: 1 hour
segment.target: Duration: 1 hour

segment.source: Most Windows updates are downloaded and installed automatically by Surface Hub.
segment.target: Most Windows updates are downloaded and installed automatically by Surface Hub.

segment.source: You can change the maintenance window to limit when the device can be automatically rebooted after a Windows update installation.
segment.target: You can change the maintenance window to limit when the device can be automatically rebooted after a Windows update installation.

segment.source: For those updates that require a reboot of the device, the update installation will be postponed until the maintenance window begins.
segment.target: For those updates that require a reboot of the device, the update installation will be postponed until the maintenance window begins.

segment.source: If a meeting is scheduled to start during the maintenance window, or if the Surface Hub sensors detect that the device is being used, the pending installation will be postponed to the next maintenance window.
segment.target: If a meeting is scheduled to start during the maintenance window, or if the Surface Hub sensors detect that the device is being used, the pending installation will be postponed to the next maintenance window.

segment.source: Note: If an update installation has been pending for 28 days, on the 28th day the update will be forcibly installed.
segment.target: Note: If an update installation has been pending for 28 days, on the 28th day the update will be forcibly installed.

segment.source: The device will ignore meetings or sensor status and reboot during the maintenance window.
segment.target: The device will ignore meetings or sensor status and reboot during the maintenance window.

segment.source: To change the default maintenance window:
segment.target: To change the default maintenance window:

segment.source: Open the Settings app.
segment.target: Open the Settings app.

segment.source: Navigate to Update and SecurityAdvanced Options.
segment.target: Navigate to Update and SecurityAdvanced Options.

segment.source: Under Maintenance hours, click Change.
segment.target: Under Maintenance hours, click Change.

segment.source: Deferring Windows updates
segment.target: Deferring Windows updates

segment.source: You can choose to defer downloading or installing updates that install new Windows features.
segment.target: You can choose to defer downloading or installing updates that install new Windows features.

segment.source: When you do, new Windows features won’t be downloaded or installed for up to several months.
segment.target: When you do, new Windows features won’t be downloaded or installed for up to several months.

segment.source: Deferring updates doesn’t affect security updates, which will be downloaded and installed as usual.
segment.target: Deferring updates doesn’t affect security updates, which will be downloaded and installed as usual.

segment.source: To defer Windows feature updates:
segment.target: To defer Windows feature updates:

segment.source: Open the Settings app.
segment.target: Open the Settings app.

segment.source: Navigate to Update and SecurityAdvanced Options.
segment.target: Navigate to Update and SecurityAdvanced Options.

segment.source: Click on the checkbox for Defer upgrades.
segment.target: Click on the checkbox for Defer upgrades.

segment.source: Using WSUS
segment.target: Using WSUS

segment.source: You can use WSUS to manage the download and installation of Windows updates on your Surface Hub.
segment.target: You can use WSUS to manage the download and installation of Windows updates on your Surface Hub.

segment.source: To connect a Surface Hub to a WSUS server:
segment.target: To connect a Surface Hub to a WSUS server:

segment.source: Open the Settings app.
segment.target: Open the Settings app.

segment.source: Navigate to Update and SecurityAdvanced Options.
segment.target: Navigate to Update and SecurityAdvanced Options.

segment.source: Click on the checkbox for Configure Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) server.
segment.target: Click on the checkbox for Configure Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) server.

segment.source: Check the box for Use WSUS Server to download updates and enter the WSUS endpoint.
segment.target: Check the box for Use WSUS Server to download updates and enter the WSUS endpoint.

segment.target: Related topics
